tasks.label: profile benchmarks (cpu) -> file
args: cd Fluid.Benchmarks && asynkron-profiler --cpu -- dotnet ./bin/Release/net10.0/Fluid.Benchmarks.dll > ../profile-cpu.txt 2>&1 && echo WROTE:../profile-cpu.txt

tasks.label: profile benchmarks (cpu) -> file (post-encode-fastpath)
args: dotnet build Fluid.Benchmarks/Fluid.Benchmarks.csproj -c Release -f net10.0 >/dev/null && cd Fluid.Benchmarks && asynkron-profiler --cpu -- dotnet ./bin/Release/net10.0/Fluid.Benchmarks.dll > ../profile-cpu-2.txt 2>&1 && echo WROTE:../profile-cpu-2.txt
